channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Resolving a Mutual TLS session resumption vulnerability】解决共同的TLS会话恢复漏洞
item.description: 【 Cloudflare patched a Mutual TLS (mTLS) vulnerability (CVE-2025-23419) reported via its Bug Bounty Program. The flaw in session resumption allowed client certificates to authenticate across different 】CloudFlare通过其Bug Bounty程序报告了相互TLS（MTLS）漏洞（CVE-2025-23419）。会话恢复中的缺陷允许客户端证书在不同的地方进行身份验证

item.title: 【Making Cloudflare the best platform for building AI Agents】使CloudFlare成为建立AI代理的最佳平台
item.description: 【 Today we’re excited to share a few announcements on how we’re making it even easier to build AI agents on Cloudflare. 】今天，我们很高兴分享一些关于我们如何使在Cloudflare上构建AI代理商变得更加容易的公告。

item.title: 【Searching for the cause of hung tasks in the Linux kernel】在Linux内核中搜索悬挂任务的原因
item.description: 【 The Linux kernel can produce a hung task warning. Searching the Internet and the kernel docs, you can find a brief explanation that the process is stuck in the uninterruptible state. 】Linux内核可以发出悬挂的任务警告。在搜索Internet和内核文档时，您可以简要说明该过程陷入了不间断的状态。

item.title: 【Cloudflare’s commitment to advancing Public Sector security worldwide by pursuing FedRAMP High, IRAP, and ENS】Cloudflare致力于通过追求FedRamp High，IRAP和ENS来推动全球公共部门安全的承诺
item.description: 【 Cloudflare achieves ENS certification, and intends to pursue FedRAMP High and IRAP. 】CloudFlare获得了ENS认证，并打算追求FedRamp High and Irap。

item.title: 【Cloudflare incident on February 6, 2025】CloudFlare事件于2025年2月6日
item.description: 【 On Thursday, February 6, 2025, we experienced an outage with our object storage service (R2) and products that rely on it. Here's what happened and what we're doing to fix this going forward. 】在2025年2月6日，星期四，我们使用对象存储服务（R2）和依靠它的产品经历了中断。这是发生的事情以及我们正在做的事情来解决此问题。

item.title: 【Automatic Audit Logs: new updates deliver increased transparency and accountability】自动审核日志：新更新提供了提高的透明度和问责制
item.description: 【 We’re excited to announce the beta release of Automatic Audit Logs, offering greater transparency and control. 】我们很高兴宣布Beta版本的自动审核日志发布，提供更大的透明度和控制。

item.title: 【Keep AI interactions secure and risk-free with Guardrails in AI Gateway】通过AI网关中的护栏保持AI相互作用安全且无风险
item.description: 【 Deploy AI safely with built-in Guardrails in AI Gateway. Flag and block harmful or inappropriate content, protect personal data, and ensure compliance in real-time 】在AI网关中使用内置的护栏安全部署AI。标记并阻止有害或不适当的内容，保护个人数据，并确保实时合规

item.title: 【Helping civil society monitor cyber attacks with the CyberPeaceTracer and Cloudflare Email Security 】帮助民间社会通过网络配置器和CloudFlare电子邮件安全性监测网络攻击
item.description: 【 We’re proud to collaborate with CyberPeace Institute by powering its latest initiative, the CyberPeace Tracer, a platform that enables civil society organizations to proactively report cyber threats. 】我们很荣幸通过为网络和平研究所合作，通过为Cyber​​peace Tracer提供动力，该计划使民间社会组织能够主动报告网络威胁。

item.title: 【Offline celebrations: how Christmas, NYE, and Lunar New Year festivities shape online behavior】离线庆祝活动：圣诞节，NYE和LUNAR新年庆祝活动如何塑造在线行为
item.description: 【 This blog examines how diverse cultural celebrations — from Western Christmas to Orthodox and Lunar New Year festivities — shape global Internet traffic. 】该博客探讨了各种文化庆典（从西部圣诞节到东正教和农历新年庆祝活动）如何塑造全球互联网流量。

item.title: 【QUIC action: patching a broadcast address amplification vulnerability】QUIC操作：修补广播地址放大漏洞
item.description: 【 Cloudflare was recently contacted by researchers who discovered a broadcast amplification vulnerability through their QUIC Internet measurement research. We've implemented a mitigation. 】最近，研究人员联系了Cloudflare，他们通过其Quic Internet测量研究发现了广播放大漏洞。我们已经实施了缓解措施。
